ProjectTitle: Strengthening FIBEr's competitive position in the medical device industry
InitialFeedbackHistory:
14/02/2025
Ethics: you indicate dual use here; dual use data is data with potential for military applications, is that indeed the case for you project? If so please have a look at the flowchart on the website for he EC DMM: https://set.kuleuven.be/ethicsatarenberg/expertise-center-ethics-arenberg-1/copy_of_dual-use/dual-use and apply for approval if needed. For research with human and animal data please add the relevant approval numbers, for more information see https://research.kuleuven.be/en/integrity-ethics/ethics/committees/index. Please upload an updated DMP with the approval numbers as intermediate DMP.  
Sharing: will you share data with other researchers via a trusted data repository, for example RDR (https://rdr.kuleuven.be/)? For more information see: https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/guidance/data-sharing
